sourcesContent:
"use client" import { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" const CreateRide = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const [rideData, setRideData] = useState({ from: "", to: "", date: "", time: "", price: "", availableSeats: 1, car: "", description: "", amenities: [], }) const amenitiesList = [ { id: "wifi", label: "WiFi", icon: "fas fa-wifi" }, { id: "music", label: "Musique", icon: "fas fa-music" }, { id: "non-smoking", label: "Non-fumeur", icon: "fas fa-ban" }, { id: "air-conditioning", label: "Climatisation", icon: "fas fa-snowflake" }, { id: "pets-allowed", label: "Animaux acceptés", icon: "fas fa-paw" }, ] const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target setRideData((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value, })) } const handleAmenityChange = (amenityId) => { setRideData((prev) => ({ ...prev, amenities: prev.amenities.includes(amenityId) ? prev.amenities.filter((id) => id !== amenityId) : [...prev.amenities, amenityId], })) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log("Creating ride:", rideData) // Here you would typically send the data to your backend alert("Trajet créé avec succès !") navigate("/search") } return (

Proposer un trajet

{/* Route Information */}
Informations du trajet
{/* Pricing and Capacity */}
Prix et capacité
{/* Vehicle Information */}
Informations du véhicule
{/* Amenities */}
Équipements disponibles
{amenitiesList.map((amenity) => (
handleAmenityChange(amenity.id)} />
))}
{/* Description */}
{/* Submit Button */}
) } export default CreateRide
